addr: 12460 West Washington Boulevard Los Angeles, CA 90066
title: Jordan Younger AKA The Balanced Blonde Book Signing "Breaking Vegan"
desc: You are invited to celebrate the Launch of Jordan Younger AKA The Balanced Blonde's new book "Breaking Vegan"! Join us at Cold & Thirsty juice bar & cryotherapy where the beautiful Jordan will be signing copies of her book and spreading inspiration to all. The Balanced Blonde's clothing line TBV Apparel will be on sale as well as Renew Juicerys delicious cold pressed juices and nutritious range of almond mylks. A portion of all sales of TBV Apparel will be donated to NKLA to promote a No Kill LA. So for a great cause and an inspirational night, come and join us and meet like amazing like minded individuals like yourselves!
